languages.text: {n}Почтительно пропустивший аристократов вперед Абеляр берет слово последним.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, род Версериан не обладает достойными вас реликвиями, но он богат талантливыми и трудолюбивыми людьми. В знак нашей верности я смиренно вручаю вам свои плоть и кровь. Сотня моих родичей отправится на подвластные вам колонии и приложит все свои таланты, чтобы миры под вашей рукой процветали".

traits.locale_text: {n}Почтительно пропустивший аристократов вперед Абеляр берет слово последним.{/n} "Ваша милость, род Версериан не обладает достойными вас реликвиями, но он богат талантливыми и трудолюбивыми людьми. В знак нашей верности я смиренно вручаю вам свои плоть и кровь. Сотня моих родичей отправится на подвластные вам колонии и приложит все свои таланты, чтобы миры под вашей рукой процветали".

languages.text: {n}Having let the aristocrats go first as a sign of deference, Abelard is the last to speak.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Werserian possesses no relics worthy of your acceptance, but we are rich in talented and hardworking people. As a sign of our loyalty, I humbly offer you my flesh and blood. A hundred of my kin will go to colonies in your protectorate and use all their talents so that the worlds in your charge may prosper."
languages.original_text: {n}Почтительно пропустивший аристократов вперед Абеляр берет слово последним.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, род Версериан не обладает достойными вас реликвиями, но он богат талантливыми и трудолюбивыми людьми. В знак нашей верности я смиренно вручаю вам свои плоть и кровь. Сотня моих родичей отправится на подвластные вам колонии и приложит все свои таланты, чтобы миры под вашей рукой процветали".

traits.locale_text: {n}Having let the aristocrats go first as a sign of deference, Abelard is the last to speak.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Werserian possesses no relics worthy of your acceptance, but we are rich in talented and hardworking people. As a sign of our loyalty, I humbly offer you my flesh and blood. A hundred of my kin will go to colonies in your empire and use all their talents so that the worlds in your charge may prosper."

As a sign of our loyalty, I humbly offer you my flesh and blood. A hundred of my kin will go to colonies in your empire and use all their talents so that the worlds in your charge may prosper."

As a sign of our loyalty, I humbly offer you my flesh and blood. A hundred of my kin will go to colonies in your empire and use all their talents so that the worlds in your charge may prosper."

As a sign of our loyalty, I humbly offer you my flesh and blood. A hundred of my kin will go to colonies in your empire and use all their talents so that the worlds in your charge may prosper."

{n}Having let the aristocrats go first as a sign of deference, Abelard is the last to speak.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Werserian possesses no relics worthy of your acceptance, but we are rich in talented and hardworking people. As a sign of our loyalty, I humbly offer you my flesh and blood. A hundred of my kin will go to colonies in your protectorate and use all their talents so that the worlds in your charge may prosper."

languages.text: {n}まず貴族に敬意の証を示させてから、アベラルドは最後に発言する。{/n}「陛下、ウェルザリアン家はお受け取りいただけるような価値ある遺物を所有しておりません。ですが、才能ある勤勉な人材に恵まれております。忠誠の証に、私の肉と血を謹んで差し出します。陛下が管理される星が繁栄できますよう、我が一族の100名は陛下が保護する植民地へ向かい、その才能を余すところなく発揮いたします」
languages.original_text: {n}Having let the aristocrats go first as a sign of deference, Abelard is the last to speak.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Werserian possesses no relics worthy of your acceptance, but we are rich in talented and hardworking people. As a sign of our loyalty, I humbly offer you my flesh and blood. A hundred of my kin will go to colonies in your protectorate and use all their talents so that the worlds in your charge may prosper."

traits.locale_text: {n}まず貴族に敬意の証を示させてから、アベラルドは最後に発言する。{/n}「陛下、ウェルザリアン家はお受け取りいただけるような価値ある遺物を所有しておりません。ですが、才能ある勤勉な人材に恵まれております。忠誠の証に、私の肉と血を謹んで差し出します。陛下が管理される星が繁栄できますよう、我が一族の100名は陛下が保護する植民地へ向かい、その才能を余すところなく発揮いたします」

languages.text: {n}出于尊重，阿贝拉德让其他贵族率先发言，他是最后一个发言的。{/n}“大人，韦尔森家族并没有配得上您的宝物，但我们家族人才济济，勤劳肯干。为了表示我们的忠诚，我谦卑地向您献上我们家族的血肉。我的一百名族人将会前往您王朝的殖民地，发挥他们的才干，让您掌管的世界繁荣昌盛。”
languages.original_text: {n}Having let the aristocrats go first as a sign of deference, Abelard is the last to speak.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Werserian possesses no relics worthy of your acceptance, but we are rich in talented and hardworking people. As a sign of our loyalty, I humbly offer you my flesh and blood. A hundred of my kin will go to colonies in your protectorate and use all their talents so that the worlds in your charge may prosper."

traits.locale_text: {n}出于尊重，阿贝拉德让其他贵族率先发言，他是最后一个发言的。{/n}“大人，韦尔森家族并没有配得上您的宝物，但我们家族人才济济，勤劳肯干。为了表示我们的忠诚，我谦卑地向您献上我们家族的血肉。我的一百名族人将会前往您王朝的殖民地，发挥他们的才干，让您掌管的世界繁荣昌盛。”

languages.text: {n}Tras dejar que los aristócratas actuaran primero como muestra de deferencia, Abelard es el último en hablar.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, la casa Werserian no posee reliquias dignas de que las acepte, pero sí tenemos mucha gente hábil y trabajadora. Como muestra de lealtad, le ofrezco a mi gente, mi sangre. Cien de mis parientes acudirán a las colonias de su protectorado y dedicarán todos sus talentos a hacer que los mundos que tiene a su cargo prosperen».
languages.original_text: {n}Having let the aristocrats go first as a sign of deference, Abelard is the last to speak.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Werserian possesses no relics worthy of your acceptance, but we are rich in talented and hardworking people. As a sign of our loyalty, I humbly offer you my flesh and blood. A hundred of my kin will go to colonies in your protectorate and use all their talents so that the worlds in your charge may prosper."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras dejar que los aristócratas actuaran primero como muestra de deferencia, Abelard es el último en hablar.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, la casa Werserian no posee reliquias dignas de que las acepte, pero sí tenemos mucha gente hábil y trabajadora. Como muestra de lealtad, le ofrezco a mi gente, mi sangre. Cien de mis parientes acudirán a las colonias de su protectorado y dedicarán todos sus talentos a hacer que los mundos que tiene a su cargo prosperen».

languages.text: {n}Vient maintenant le tour d'Abélard, qui a laissé les autres aristocrates passer avant lui en signe de déférence.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, la maison Werserian n'a hélas aucune relique digne de vous en sa possession. En revanche, les membres de notre famille ne rechignent jamais à la tâche. En gage de loyauté, je vous offre ma chair et mon sang. Cent des nôtres se rendront donc dans vos colonies et mettront leurs nombreux talents au service de votre protectorat pour en assurer la prospérité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Having let the aristocrats go first as a sign of deference, Abelard is the last to speak.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Werserian possesses no relics worthy of your acceptance, but we are rich in talented and hardworking people. As a sign of our loyalty, I humbly offer you my flesh and blood. A hundred of my kin will go to colonies in your protectorate and use all their talents so that the worlds in your charge may prosper."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vient maintenant le tour d'Abélard, qui a laissé les autres aristocrates passer avant lui en signe de déférence.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, la maison Werserian n'a hélas aucune relique digne de vous en sa possession. En revanche, les membres de notre famille ne rechignent jamais à la tâche. En gage de loyauté, je vous offre ma chair et mon sang. Cent des nôtres se rendront donc dans vos colonies et mettront leurs nombreux talents au service de votre protectorat pour en assurer la prospérité. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard, der den Aristokraten aus Hochachtung den Vortritt gelassen hat, spricht als Letzter.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, das Haus Werserian besitzt keine Relikte, die Eurer würdig wären, aber wir verfügen über zahlreiche begabte und fleißige Menschen. Als Zeichen unserer Loyalität biete ich Euch demütig mein Fleisch und Blut an. Einhundert der Meinen werden in Kolonien Eures Protektorats ziehen und all ihre Talente einsetzen, damit Eure Welten blühen und gedeihen."
languages.original_text: {n}Having let the aristocrats go first as a sign of deference, Abelard is the last to speak.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Werserian possesses no relics worthy of your acceptance, but we are rich in talented and hardworking people. As a sign of our loyalty, I humbly offer you my flesh and blood. A hundred of my kin will go to colonies in your protectorate and use all their talents so that the worlds in your charge may prosper."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, der den Aristokraten aus Hochachtung den Vortritt gelassen hat, spricht als Letzter.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, das Haus Werserian besitzt keine Relikte, die Eurer würdig wären, aber wir verfügen über zahlreiche begabte und fleißige Menschen. Als Zeichen unserer Loyalität biete ich Euch demütig mein Fleisch und Blut an. Einhundert der Meinen werden in Kolonien Eures Protektorats ziehen und all ihre Talente einsetzen, damit Eure Welten blühen und gedeihen."

languages.text: {n}Son söz hakkı, hürmetini ifade etmek aristokratların gerisinde bekleyen Abelard'da.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Werserian Hanesinin size takdim edilmeye layık bir yadigârı olmasa da Hanemiz, hünerli ve çalışkan insanlardan oluşur. Sadakatimizin bir işareti olarak size kendi naçizane kanımı ve canımı armağan ediyorum. Soyumdan yüz kişi, protektoranızdaki kolonilere gidecek ve hükmettiğiniz dünyaların refahı için tüm hünerlerini gösterecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Having let the aristocrats go first as a sign of deference, Abelard is the last to speak.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, House Werserian possesses no relics worthy of your acceptance, but we are rich in talented and hardworking people. As a sign of our loyalty, I humbly offer you my flesh and blood. A hundred of my kin will go to colonies in your protectorate and use all their talents so that the worlds in your charge may prosper."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son söz hakkı, hürmetini ifade etmek için öncelikle aristokratlara sıra veren Abelard'da.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Werserian Hanesinin size takdim edilmeye layık hiçbir yadigârı yoktur fakat Hanemiz, hünerli ve çalışkan insanlardan oluşur. Sadakatimizin bir işareti olarak size kendi naçizane kanımı ve canımı armağan ediyorum. Soyumdan yüz kişi, protektoranızdaki kolonilere gidecek ve hükmettiğiniz dünyaların refahı için tüm hünerlerini gösterecek."
